testcase.classname: Order Placement on Demo Web Shop
testcase.name: User places an order successfully
testcase.system-out: Given User launches website in a browser....................................passed When User clicks on the login link..........................................passed And User enters valid email "manas@haxa.com" and password "manas@11"........passed And User navigates to the Computer menu and clicks on Desktop...............passed And User selects the second desktop.........................................passed And User selects RAM and HDD options........................................passed And User clicks on "Add to Cart" button.....................................passed And User moves to the shopping cart menu....................................passed And User clicks on "Go to Cart" button......................................passed And User selects "I agree with terms" checkbox..............................passed And User clicks on "Checkout" button........................................passed And User fills in the required billing details..............................passed And User continue with shipping address.....................................passed And User confirms shipping method...........................................passed And User selects "Cash on Delivery" as the payment method...................passed And User confirms with payment information..................................passed And User clicks on "Confirm" button.........................................passed Then User should see success message........................................passed And User clicks on the logout button........................................passed
